Notable achievements

Helped on an opening on a newly built restaurant/pub (over 100 seats). Marston`s

A team of 3 managers and 2 supervisors had to build a floorplan, booking system, stock level, rota and holiday system. With help of the head office we trained 35 waiters/waitresses.

Managed numerous pizza express branches

During my time as an Assistant Manager for Pizza Express I was in charge of a number of branches in the South London region. On restaurant managers annual leave and illness I have covered and succesfully ran the restaurant with great success. Maintained stock levels and customer satisfaction.
Customer service is an attitude not a department.
